Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのハックだよネ!? 何があったのかな!? 逃げてるみたいだったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: That was Hack just now, right?! What's going on?! Seemed like he was running away or something...

Entry.JapaneseText: 直接、聞いてみたほうが良さそうだな…… ハックを追うんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We should probably ask him that ourselves. Let's go after him.
